actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the treatment of intangible drilling costs as an item of tax preference.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions listing intangible drilling costs made in connection with oil, gas, and geothermal resources development as a tax preference item for purposes of the minimum tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the treatment of intangible drilling costs as an item of tax preference.
